articles.title: Welcome to the website
articles.description: Read about me below, and checkout other pages on the top-right
articles.contents:
About me
I am a PhD student in Civil and Environmental Engineering at University of Windsor. My supervisors are Chris Lee and Hanna Maoh. My research is about driver behavior and its role in traffic safety in mixed traffic flow (cars and heavy-vehicles). I love R and Rstudio.

You can download my resume here.
You know my name, now tell me about yourself:


Research
Education
Ph.D. Civil Engineering (Candidate) 2015 – 2021
University of Windsor, Windsor, Ontario, Canada
B.Sc. Transportation Engineering 2005 – 2009
University of Engineering and Technology Lahore, Pakistan
